Send a blank e-mail to * smarty-discussion-subscribe@googlegroups.com * * @link http://www.smarty.net/ * @copyright 2008 New Digital Group, Inc. * @author Monte Ohrt <monte at ohrt dot com> * @author Uwe Tews * @author Rodney Rehm * @package Smarty * @version 3.1-DEV */
/** * set SMARTY_DIR to absolute path to Smarty library files. * Sets SMARTY_DIR only if user application has not already defined it. */
/** * set SMARTY_SYSPLUGINS_DIR to absolute path to Smarty internal plugins. * Sets SMARTY_SYSPLUGINS_DIR only if user application has not already defined it. */

/** * The date format to be used internally * (accepts date() and strftime()) */
/** * auto literal on delimiters with whitspace * @var boolean */
/** * display error on not assigned variables * @var boolean */
/** * look up relative filepaths in include_path * @var boolean */
/** * template directory * @var array */
/** * joined template directory string used in cache keys * @var string */
/** * joined config directory string used in cache keys * @var string */
/** * default template handler * @var callable */
/** * default config handler * @var callable */
/** * default plugin handler * @var callable */
/** * compile directory * @var string */
/** * plugins directory * @var array */
/** * cache directory * @var string */
/** * config directory * @var array */
/** * force template compiling? * @var boolean */
/** * check template for modifications? * @var boolean */
/** * use sub dirs for compiled/cached files? * @var boolean */
/** * allow ambiguous resources (that are made unique by the resource handler) * @var boolean */
/** * caching enabled * @var boolean */
/** * merge compiled includes * @var boolean */
/** * cache lifetime in seconds * @var integer */
/** * force cache file creation * @var boolean */
/** * Set this if you want different sets of cache files for the same * templates. * * @var string */
/** * Set this if you want different sets of compiled files for the same * templates. * * @var string */
/** * template left-delimiter * @var string */
/** * template right-delimiter * @var string */
/** * class name * * This should be instance of Smarty_Security. * * @var string * @see Smarty_Security */
/** * implementation of security class * * @var Smarty_Security */
/** * controls handling of PHP-blocks * * @var integer */
/** * controls if the php template file resource is allowed * * @var bool */
/** * Should compiled-templates be prevented from being called directly? * * {@internal * Currently used by Smarty_Internal_Template only. * }} * * @var boolean */
/** * debug mode * * Setting this to true enables the debug-console. * * @var boolean */

/** * This determines if debugging is enable-able from the browser. *
    *
  • NONE => no debugging control allowed
    • *
  • URL => enable debugging when SMARTY_DEBUG is found in the URL.
    • *
* @var string */
/** * Name of debugging URL-param. * * Only used when $debugging_ctrl is set to 'URL'. * The name of the URL-parameter that activates debugging. * * @var type */
/** * Path of debug template. * @var string */
/** * When set, smarty uses this value as error_reporting-level. * @var int */
/** * Internal flag for getTags() * @var boolean */
/** * Controls whether variables with the same name overwrite each other. * @var boolean */
/** * Controls whether config values of on/true/yes and off/false/no get converted to boolean. * @var boolean */
/** * Controls whether hidden config sections/vars are read from the file. * @var boolean */
/** * locking concurrent compiles * @var boolean */
/** * Controls whether cache resources should emply locking mechanism * @var boolean */
/** * seconds to wait for acquiring a lock before ignoring the write lock * @var float */
/** * global template functions * @var array */
/** * resource type used if none given * * Must be an valid key of $registered_resources. * @var string */
/** * caching type * * Must be an element of $cache_resource_types. * * @var string */
/** * internal config properties * @var array */
/** * config type * @var string */
/** * cached template objects * @var array */
